# 7. Lexicons

LaBB-CAT can be integrated with various lexicon to facilitate automatic
tagging of word tokens.

For our English data, there are two main options:

-   [CELEX](7a-lexicon-celex.qmd), a 'British English' lexicon which must be purchased from the
    LDC, and
-   The [CMU Pronouncing Dictionary](7b-lexicon-cmudict), an 'American English' lexicon
    that\'s free to download.
